channel.title: CVE Feed for NLnet Labs -- Routinator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NLnet Labs -- Routinator

item.title: CVE-2024-1622|2024-02-26T13:35:51.909Z -- NLnet Labs -- Routinator
item.description: Due to a mistake in error checking, Routinator will terminate when an incoming RTR connection is reset by the peer too quickly after opening.
